original_title: ตำนานกระสือ
overview: Back to its origin where her story has never been clearly narrated, Kra Sue is a common name calling any lady ghost living on eating waste and flesh - in fresh and bloody raw. Her distinct capability is to take her own head off the body, and fly with bright light shining from her digestive organs to hunt for fresh preys.
tagline: A life sacrificed for love. A body threatened by hatred. A full of hatred soul is looking for revenge.
title: Demonic Beauty
